name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert
description:
This installer will download the installation program built by FunkyFr3sh. This tool allows you to install the full version from one of the available mirrors and install the neccessary patches to make it run on modern systems.

For reference see:
https://cnc-comm.com/red-alert/downloads/the-game/installer
content:
files:
- installer: http://downloads.cncnet.org/RA1installer.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Games/Red Alert/ra95.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
